description: This is an HTML source file for a web-based database visualizer UI, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript for dynamic interactions such as loading database lists, tables, and data, and rendering them in a tabular format.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and updates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Reloads the database list, resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database's table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data as an HTML table including header and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell based on data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
